LanguageData.Bed_AdvBed.label: advanced bed
LanguageData.Bed_AdvBed.description: A powered high-tech bed that automatically readjusts itself to perfectly fit the contours of the sleeper, with built in white noise generation. Sleepers often report feeling refreshed and more alert the morning after.
LanguageData.Bed_AdvDoubleBed.label: advanced double bed
LanguageData.Bed_AdvDoubleBed.description: A powered high-tech double bed that automatically readjusts itself to perfectly fit the contours of both sleepers, with built in white noise generation. Sleepers often report feeling refreshed and more alert the morning after.
LanguageData.Table_IlluminatedEndTable.label: illuminated end table
LanguageData.Table_IlluminatedEndTable.description: A small illuminated bedside table adorned with light strips which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable, whilst lighting the room. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Table_IlluminatedDresser.label: illuminated dresser
LanguageData.Table_IlluminatedDresser.description: An illuminated dresser, adorned with light strips. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds, whilst lighting up the room. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
